headline: RBC Sees Opportunity in F5 Inc. (FFIV) After the Breach-Driven Pullback. Here’s Why
summary: F5 Inc. (NASDAQ:FFIV) is among the best software infrastructure stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On January 5, RBC Capital Markets upgraded F5 to Outperform from Sector Perform and raised its price target to $325 from $315, implying a further 27% upside potential. This upgrade came after substantial erosion in the stock’s value over the […]
